Posts.Content: Cookie123b wrote: Hi everyone. I have very dense fibrocystic breasts that are riddled with cysts. I had two macro cysts aspirated this fall (one 40cc, the other 20cc) because the pain was so unbearable. When the cysts hurt the most I also feel very veryunwell. Today I’m in pain and can feel the cysts enlarged but also feel almost like I have the flu (which I don’t no temp or other symptoms). I feel awful. I am posting here to see if anyone else experiences feeling unwell when their breasts hurt the most. It’s really impacting my life and aside from aspirations,EPO and managing caffeine I am not sure what to do. It’s almost like my body is having a response to the cysts. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast cysts and feeling unwell Cookie123b hkkw17
